article_title: Unbelievable! Congress Can't Find $30 Billion For Medical Device Excise Tax Repeal

article_metadata.description: Congress may be on the verge of repealing Obamacare’s medical device excise tax. I am all for repealing it, which will reduce funding for Obamacare by $24 billion over ten years. That means Congress has to offset repeal by cutting spending by the same amount. Can’t be done, says Senator Orrin Hatch, Chairman of the Senate Finance Committee. It should be as hard to find $24 billion or $30 billion of spending offsets as it is to find a cup of coffee at Starbucks
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
